0082.HK.summary: V1 Group Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the telemedia business in the People's Republic of China. It operates through two segments, Sports and Lottery Related Business, and Telemedia and E-Commerce Business. The Sports and Lottery-Related Business segment develops and operates online information platforms, online mobile game applications, live-streaming platforms, online mobile interactive gaming applications, and related products of sports nature, as well as sells lottery tickets through retail channels. The Telemedia and E-Commerce Business segment provides online internet information services, such as internet audio-visual media, and other Internet and businesses; and operates online trading platform and satellite TV station. The company also provides an audio/video transmission platform for delivering a range of cross media telecommunications contents and valued added services; advertisement and entertainment production services; and technical, and promotional and advertising services. The company was formerly known as VODone Limited and changed its name to V1 Group Limited in July 2014. V1 Group Limited was founded in 2005 and is based in Beijing, China.
